models.animals

Class Wolf

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.animals.Animal
      • models.animals.Wolf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnimalInterface, Mammal, WanderAnimal

    public class Wolf
extends Animal
implements Mammal, WanderAnimal
    Represents a wolf animal
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yoan Ballesteros, Antoine Sirven

      • copulate

        public <A extends Mammal> void copulate(A wolf,
                                        int turnNb)
        Performs a copulation between the current animal instance and the given animal (which must be the same)
        Specified by:
        copulate in interface Mammal
        Overrides:
        copulate in class Animal
        Type Parameters:
        A - Generic type used for the animals parameter, which is here a type extending Mammal
        Parameters:
        wolf - The animal instance that represents the male
        turnNb - The current turn number, to mark the beginning of the pregnancy

        Returns:
